name: Quaternion Paradox
description:
Best experienced in full screen

Gravity is yours to control in this 3D platforming puzzle game. Chill out and relax while navigating the mind-bending corridors and rooms of the facility, there's no rush here, just the freedom of the three dimensions.

Controls:

  • Move - WASD
  • Look - Mouse
  • Jump - Space
  • Double Jump - Space while in the air

Relax, you've got all the time in the world...

Note: It's a hefty game, so please give it a minute while it loads.

Known Bug: Jump strength is different every time the game is played, I've no idea why...

Known Bug: The end is WAY too bright, but there's an object there to end the game.

Known Bug: The Begin button doesn't work after completing the game, feel free to refresh the page to play again.

Hint: Anything blue is related to gravity, try touching it!

Hint: Anything yellow is subject to gravity!
